## Request for Proposal for Access Control System Replacement
### Solicitation Number
1000407829

### Contracting Authority
Government of Canada, represented by Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA)

### Request for Proposal Overview
The Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) Prescott Port-of-Entry (PoE) is seeking a supplier to replace the existing Access Control System (ACS) computer, software, and hardware, as well as provide maintenance services for the system.

### Background
The current ACS, Facility Commander Wnx, has been declared end-of-life by the manufacturer, with hardware components reaching end-of-life in December 2019 and software components in December 2020.

### Scope of Work
The selected supplier must replace the end-of-life hardware components and software with a new ACS platform. All supplies and parts must be in stock and available for installation by March 31, 2023.

### Key Requirements

* The supplier must possess the necessary expertise and experience to design, install, and maintain a new ACS system.
* The supplier must provide a comprehensive maintenance plan to ensure the system operates optimally.
* The supplier must ensure that all installations and modifications are carried out in compliance with relevant standards and regulations.

### Trade Agreements
This procurement is covered by the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

### Contract Valuation
The estimated value of this contract is not specified.

### Notice of Amendment
The closing date for this Request for Proposal has been extended to March 16, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST.

### Contact Information
For more information, please contact:

Veronique Fulham
Contracting Authority
Telephone: None
Email: [Veronique.Fulham@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca](mailto:Veronique.Fulham@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca)
Address: 355 North River Road, Ottawa, ON K1A 0L8

### Documents

A list of attached documents can be found on CanadaBuys, including relevant amendments. Suppliers are encouraged to review these documents to ensure they understand the scope of work and requirements.

### Eligibility

Only suppliers who are qualified and "active" SA holders at the time of bid solicitation are eligible to be invited to bid.

### Submission Guidelines

The submitted proposal must meet all the specified requirements outlined in the RFP document. The proposal must be submitted electronically through CanadaBuys at the specified closing date and time. Late
